Uses of Interface
android.view.Menu

Packages that use Menu
android.app High-level classes encapsulating the overall Android application model. 
android.test A framework for writing Android test cases and suites. 
android.view Provides classes that expose basic user interface classes that handle screen layout and interaction with the user. 
 

Uses of Menu in android.app
 

Methods in android.app with parameters of type Menu
 void Activity.onContextMenuClosed(Menu menu)
          This hook is called whenever the context menu is being closed (either by the user canceling the menu with the back/menu button, or when an item is selected).
 void Dialog.onContextMenuClosed(Menu menu)
           
 boolean Activity.onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          Initialize the contents of the Activity's standard options menu.
 boolean Dialog.onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          It is usually safe to proxy this call to the owner activity's Activity.onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) if the client desires the same menu for this Dialog.
 boolean Activity.onCreatePanelMenu(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Default implementation of Window.Callback.onCreatePanelMenu(int, android.view.Menu) for activities.
 boolean Dialog.onCreatePanelMenu(int featureId, Menu menu)
           
 boolean Activity.onMenuOpened(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Called when a panel's menu is opened by the user.
 boolean Dialog.onMenuOpened(int featureId, Menu menu)
           
 void Activity.onOptionsMenuClosed(Menu menu)
          This hook is called whenever the options menu is being closed (either by the user canceling the menu with the back/menu button, or when an item is selected).
 void Dialog.onOptionsMenuClosed(Menu menu)
           
 void Activity.onPanelClosed(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Default implementation of Window.Callback.onPanelClosed(int, Menu) for activities.
 void Dialog.onPanelClosed(int featureId, Menu menu)
           
 boolean Activity.onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          Prepare the Screen's standard options menu to be displayed.
 boolean Dialog.onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
          It is usually safe to proxy this call to the owner activity's Activity.onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu) if the client desires the same menu for this Dialog.

          Default implementation of Window.Callback.onPreparePanel(int, android.view.View, android.view.Menu) for activities.
 boolean Dialog.onPreparePanel(int featureId, View view, Menu menu)

Uses of Menu in android.view
 

Subinterfaces of Menu in android.view
 interface ContextMenu
          Extension of Menu for context menus providing functionality to modify the header of the context menu.
 interface SubMenu
          Subclass of Menu for sub menus.
 

Methods in android.view with parameters of type Menu
 void MenuInflater.inflate(int menuRes, Menu menu)
          Inflate a menu hierarchy from the specified XML resource.
 boolean Window.Callback.onCreatePanelMenu(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Initialize the contents of the menu for panel 'featureId'.
 boolean Window.Callback.onMenuOpened(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Called when a panel's menu is opened by the user.
 void Window.Callback.onPanelClosed(int featureId, Menu menu)
          Called when a panel is being closed.
 boolean Window.Callback.onPreparePanel(int featureId, View view, Menu menu)
          Prepare a panel to be displayed.
